title: Ford submits Letter of Intent to TN Government outlining plan for Chennai plant
description: Ford has submitted a Letter of Intent to the Tamil Nadu Government to use its Chennai plant for manufacturing exports. The company plans to increase its employee base in Chennai and is conducting a feasibility study on products like the Endeavour and Mustang, with potential future plans for an affordable electric vehicle platform.
